forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely between 8am and 11am, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 2am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. North northwest wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
